title: [K-12] Online Discussion Experience Design in Blended Learning Models

context.prior_knowledge: Basic proficiency in online learning platforms and intermediate-level background knowledge in social sciences
context.additional_context: Design should incorporate a blend of asynchronous discussion forums and synchronous sessions to enhance social interaction, along with a user-friendly interface tailored to learners' age groups.

learning_goals: Learners can present three or more structured arguments aligned with discussion topics in asynchronous forums to engage in deep interactions with peers.
Learners can enhance knowledge construction by applying collaborative learning strategies based on Vygotsky’s sociocultural theory in online discussions.

Analyze 3 discussion cases conducted in a blended environment (online/face-to-face) over 2 weeks, create a comparative table of each mode’s strengths/weaknesses (participation, interaction, time efficiency, etc.), and propose 2 personalized self-directed learning strategies based on the analysis.

resources: Discussion Forum within LMS (Learning Management System)
Video Conferencing Tool for Synchronous Sessions

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
